nodes.text: Julien, nicknamed "Ju-ju" by his sister Lauren Mel Coelho, was a male individual who lived on Tangenine. He was born to Remba and Kelven. His family had a norango farm but were extorted by the Malandro syndicate until Remba failed to pay and their leader Annaz killed her and Kelven. Lauren and Julien then lived with their gran until she died of a fever. Julien later fell ill so Lauren took a job with the Malandro syndicate to pay for a treatment. She was caught by the authorities and landed in jail, leaving Julien to die alone.
